name: Our Final Days
description:
This game has been created in 72 hours for the GameJam of r/SoloDevelopment.

Unfortunately it is far from finished and is far behind from what I envisioned. I just wanted too much, I guess. :,)

RULES & CONTROLS:

The objective is to get resources in the daytime and survive the night. The game is only played with a mouse.

Left Mouse Button: Select villager / Send Villager to Position / Inspect Building

Right Mouse Button: Deselect villager / cancel build process
